attributes.action: Make the rich pay their way
attributes.additional_details:
*50% tax rate for anyone earning over £500,000 per year
*50% tax rate on bonuses over £100,000
*New tax measures for banks/corporations/individuals responsible for the CDS/derivatives crisis. They need to pay for what they did.
*Tougher laws to prevent corporations dodging their tax
*Legislation to stop banks operating in tax havens or refuse them a license to trade with UK banks
